Row.Text: The long-standing feud between the noble Houses of Guelph and Ghibelle have finally reached boiling point. We must step in and take sides, lest their discord bring the very country to civil war.[NEWLINE]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]50% chance that Guelph Mercenaries will appear[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR]
We have favoured the pious Guelphs in their feud with the Ghibelles.
The House of Visconti, rulers of Milan, has sided with the House of Guelph in a domestic feud, sparking the opposing Ghibelles to take up arms.
We have favoured the prestigious Ghibelles in their feud with the Guelphs.
The House of Visconti, rulers of Milan, has sided with the House of Ghibelle in a domestic feud, sparking the opposing Guelphs to take up arms.

Throughout the court, our courtiers are speaking on a treatise written by the great philosopher Machiavelli, in which he praises our methods to secure our rule over Milan. He has, however, criticised us for relying too much upon mercenary troops, and he warns us that they only serve to de-legitimise our government.[NEWLINE]
Bah! What does he know? Mercenaries are the best.
We shall see to it that a standing army is put in place of mercenaries then.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Charter Mercenary Company may no longer be enacted[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive 4 free Military Units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]4 Military Units become maintenance free[ENDCOLOR]
Machiavelli has written of us in a political treatise.
